import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WebsocketService } from '../websocket.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-testsocket', templateUrl: './testsocket.component.html', styleUrls: ['./testsocket.component.css'] }) export class TestsocketComponent implements OnInit{ addnum! : string; constructor(private webSocketService: WebsocketService) {} data : string[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { this.webSocketService.connect().subscribe((data) => { this.data = data; console.log(data); }); } sendDataToServer(): void { if(this.addnum != null) this.webSocketService.sendData(this.addnum); } }
